casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the ESTATE OF Samuel Joseph FEINER, Deceased. Lyle Brooch Ian and Moshe Feiner, Plaintiffs-Respondents,
v.
Usher Feiner and Pearl Berkovits, Defendants-Petitioners. Children of David Feiner, Intervenors-Respondents. C-751 September Term 2017
080251 Supreme Court of New Jersey. March 26, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000561-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
